summary: This document contains three easyJet boarding passes for flight EZY8295 from London Gatwick to Innsbruck on January 10, 2020. The passengers are Giuseppe Cipolla, Hilla Dragushansky, and Carmit Tacheraverbuch, traveling together in adjacent seats.

events.title: Flight to Innsbruck
events.description: easyJet flight EZY8295 departs from London Gatwick (North Terminal) to Innsbruck at 11:30.

keyFacts: Three individuals—Giuseppe Cipolla, Hilla Dragushansky, and Carmit Tacheraverbuch—traveled together on easyJet flight EZY8295 from London to Innsbruck on January 10, 2020.
The passengers were seated in adjacent seats 20D, 20E, and 20F, indicating coordinated travel.
None of the passengers had checked luggage, only cabin bags.
The document is a flight record from 2020, which is after Jeffrey Epstein's death in August 2019.
The names and travel do not have an obvious direct connection to the core Epstein case based on this document alone.
